content:
In case anyone didn't see this tweet.

https://twitter.com/backdropcms/status/1372594644974854148

Looking for help moving a Drupal 7 site to Backdrop: thousands of nodes using Paragraphs and self-hosted video. Several complicated tag systems (users can tag their work even if they didn't post the node, so work shows on their page) Contact @dabitch if you can help!

- Backdrop CMS (@backdropcms)
